catalogue_raissonne: Hagiwara Hideo hanga sakuhin mokuroku 2013, no. 542
description: abstract image with woman's face outlined on left and two ornate shapes at center and left, resembling frames or gates; green and yellow along bottom edge, red circular shape at center, navy figures, purple UL corner, and light yellow background; circular area of light wash in UCQ and along right side
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
title: Lady No. 14
